channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @kampeas Counterpoint: proposing policy reflects a lack of faith in God, who ensures that all get their due in the works to come so ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. Cf Telushkin here: https://t.co/iSvKYCgDk4

@Shmarya The point of the guns is to commit genocide. First against the natives, then against Ty slaves. And soon against the (((globalists))).
@Shmarya I expect my final pleasures as I slave away in a Prager U Reeducation camp will be the occasional public executions of people like Nancy Pelosi and her fellow Hindenburg Democrats.
@Atrios Too bad that SCOTUS will abolish the EPA before he could be charged for air pollution.

@DrZackaryBerger What if we assumed that the preferred policy of this Christian nation is that people meet Jesus as soon as possible, and put the burden of proof on people to reject that theology? I‚Äôm tired of imputing good intentions to people who consistently deliver bad results.
@ashleyfeinberg @DrZackaryBerger They won‚Äôt take action when Anerican school children are murdered, and both parties clarion to like school children.
@trekonomics It‚Äôs a slaver republic, not a democracy. The more slaves you brought with you to the colony of New Jersey, the more land you were granted.
@mjs_DC Time for a National Museum of Victims of Libertarianism on the Mall.
@micahinATL I‚Äôd like to think that his demands for ‚Äúus‚Äù to do something is a call for stochastic terrorism.
@AndrewGhalili @dylanotes @jinsadc Ah. If you can‚Äôt trust a guy who lied to Congress, who can you trust?

Sad you‚Äôre not willing to trust Bibi Netanyahu‚Äôs strategic wisdom in this. https://t.co/KyIMvCYWuE
Given his track record. https://t.co/dnJRosFUIA
@ShulimLeifer What business would you recommend for making friends?
@lrozen Sort of the flip side of Bibi so scaring Obama about the threat that he reached for the deal.
This. https://t.co/x1JIxbPV3i
And yet, misogynist religions still get tax breaks. Maybe that should change. https://t.co/erumMdQiQc
@joshtpm When you believe in heaven, you don‚Äôt need to deal with policy; you can count on God to give Anne Frank and Adolph Eichmann their aporopriate just desserts. https://t.co/iSvKYCgDk4
@TheRaDR Did you see this post from earlier this month from the manufacturer of the murder weapon? https://t.co/uucbZe9oAw
Two words. Backpack nukes. https://t.co/xmJ8nvkMAR
@Will_Bunch @froomkin Two words: Hindenburg Democrats. More scared of their shadows then of the fascists they‚Äôre preparing to hand the keys to.

@shaifranklin Gotta admire Joe‚Äôs choosing the political win over Israel‚Äôs strategic interests.
@shaifranklin Anyway, one of the biggest pro Israel hawks in DC has doubts about how serious the Jews really take any of this, so ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è https://t.co/soZ6nUPq7v
@frumfollies @JasonSCampbell Ultimately, Congress pays for the security guards.
@HeldShai @datadivajf When we stopped fighting about religion in the name of civility, religion lost all ability for self-critique.
